channel.title: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?
channel.description:
I seem to be getting them alot lately. Like when i use magic on certain npcs... most actually it will do that error and it will dc me then i will reconnect.
Does anyone know how to fix these errors?

item.title: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

On another topic

wrap your method in a try-catch clause

You should just stop trying now.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?

item.title: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

Ok i’m trying to fix but if i had this…

[code]} catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException) {
sendMsg(“An error has occured while casting magic on an NPC.”);

		}[/code]

(Which i know that problay isn’t right atm) Wouldn’t it only just send the message to the player but not fix the bug of casting the spell? (I mostly get it from casting spells)

And by the way… i’m getting this error:

code expected
} catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException) {
^[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?

item.source: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?

item.title: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

The base index of an array is 0; trying to access an array index less than 0 or higher than the length of the array will cause an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException to be thrown.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i fix OutOfBoundsException errors?
